attributes.action: Stop Japan killing all whale species for scientific research
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Japan have a permit from the International Whale Commission to hunt 1000 whales each year for scientific research. This research is not needed to ensure their survival and definately does not warrant a lethal and undignified death

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
